name: QuickFrench
0:
”Alexa, open Quick French”
”Alexa, start Quick French”
”Alexa, run Quick French”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: quick french
des: Want to practice your French? Need a quick translation? This skill is simple, fast and can translate entire phrases! Just open the skill, speak a word or phrase in English, and Alexa will say it back to you in French. It's easy! Translation results by Google.
